attributes.comment:
Hello,

As necessary,CMS should seek congressional changes to privacy laws that allow an ambulance EMT limited medically necessary access to a transported individual health information to facilitate reasonable care and maintenance to a hospital or other necessitous medical facility. As an example,to administer pain medication to a person with sickle cell disease. A National Directory of Healthcare Providers and Services should be comprehensive incorporating many purposes.

So in other words,a National Directory of Healthcare Providers should be multipurpose allowing EMS ambulance personnel medically necessary access among other non ambulance multipurpose reasons.

I am a person with disabilities living in rural america.

Thanks for reading.

--
This submission may or may not contain error and or flaw.

Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 and or The Americans with Disabilities Act

shall apply.
